original_title: In Jane Austen's Footsteps with Gyles Brandreth
overview: Broadcaster Gyles Brandreth travels to the West Yorkshire moors, known as "Bronte Country". It is an area that shaped the Bronte sisters, and they have, in turn, helped shape it. He explores some of the influences on their writing.
title: In Jane Austen's Footsteps with Gyles Brandreth
